short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for turning Videos into captivating and personalized GIFs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your creativity with GIF Spark, the ultimate Chrome extension for GIF creation and customization. Whether you're a social media enthusiast, a content creator, or just love expressing yourself through animated images, GIF Spark is here to make your GIF-making experience a breeze.
Turn your favorite videos or image sequences into stunning GIFs within seconds. Simply select the desired frames, set the duration, and voila! Your personalized GIF is ready to share.
